snippet.title: Cardbob: Revival | Action-packed sci-fi cardboard roguelite | Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
------------------------------------------------
Play the demo and wishlist Cardbob: Revival on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1963670/Cardbob_Revival/
------------------------------------------------
Prepare your cardboard, this is going to be one hell of a dungeon run! Cardbob: Revival is a 3D sci-fi cardboard-y action roguelite where you fight enemies, upgrade yourself and your weapon, collect loot, and haggle in your shop with customers.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/bWxcZjn
